Question Text: Indicator of match verification after creation of user profile - updated by sites
Questions/Notes: Default, Not yet verified - 0, assigned at submission of  StudyIDs from sites for active recruits and when token is assigned from passive recruites.  Updates will be received from the sites as part of the verification table.
Additional Notes: Bhaumik - I think this has generally been treated as a boolean so far, however we  recognized a need to resolve those who cannot be verified from those awaiting verification last year, but it hadn't been implimented yet due to wanting to make all the changes at once.  Is the boolean too ingrained in the systerm at this point to switch to the categorical?
